entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Parry Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:56 a.m. EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.6Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 2:00 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
Temperature: 0.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 91 %
Dewpoint: -0.7°C
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with rain. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:25 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Temperature rising to 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature rising to 10 by morning. Forecast issued 11:25 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain or snow. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain changing to a few flurries near noon. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 in the morning then becoming north 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:25 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
